LOGIN_SCREEN_WELCOME_MESSAGE: Welcome to Argentum Online, enjoy your adventure!
MENSAJE_RECHAZO_ATAQUE_ESCUDO: You blocked the attack with your shield.
MENSAJE_USUARIO_RECHAZO_ATAQUE_ESCUDO: The user blocked the attack with their shield.
MENSAJE_USAR_MEDITANDO: You're meditating! You must stop meditating to use items.
MENSAJE_SEGURO_PARTY_ON: Now no one can invite you to a group.
MENSAJE_SEGURO_PARTY_OFF: Now you can receive group invitations.
MENSAJE_GOLPE_CABEZA: The creature hit your head for
MENSAJE_GOLPE_BRAZO_IZQ: The creature hit your left arm for
MENSAJE_GOLPE_BRAZO_DER: The creature hit your right arm for
MENSAJE_GOLPE_PIERNA_IZQ: The creature hit your left leg for
MENSAJE_GOLPE_PIERNA_DER: The creature hit your right leg for
MENSAJE_GOLPE_TORSO: The creature hit your torso for
MENSAJE_TRABAJO_PESCA: Click on the spot where you want to fish...
MENSAJE_DEBES_ELEGIR_EL_MOTIVO_DE_TU_CON: You must choose the reason for your query.
MENSAJE_EXPLIQUE_CORRECTAMENTE_EL_MOTIVO: Please explain the reason for your query correctly!
MENSAJE_DEJE_EL_NOMBRE_DEL_PERSONAJE_Y_A: Provide the name of the character and the administrator related to your request.
MENSAJE_SE_PRIORIZARA_CONSULTA_A_ADMINIS: Your query will be prioritized by sending a message to the connected administrators. Please use this option responsibly.
MENSAJE_SUGERENCIA_LEIDA_Y_TOMADA_EN_CUE: Your suggestion will be read by a staff member and taken into account for future changes.
MENSAJE_EXPLIQUE_DETALLADAMENTE_EL_ERROR: Explain in detail how to reproduce the error. The programming staff will resolve it as soon as possible.
MENSAJE_DEJE_DATOS_POSIBLES_PARA_CONSULT: Provide as much information as possible. This option is for queries that don't fit into other sections.
MENSAJE_QUEJA_HACIA_MIEMBRO_DEL_STAFF: If your complaint is against a staff member, please indicate to whom it refers and the reasons, providing as many details as possible.
MENSAJE_NO_PODES_AGARRAR_OBJETOS_MIENTRA: You cannot pick up items while trading.
MENSAJE_NO_PODES_TIRAR_OBJETOS_MIENTRAS_: You cannot drop items while trading.
MENSAJE_DESACTIVAR_SEGURO_CON_SEG: To deactivate the lock, type /SEG or use the button in the MENU tab in the bottom right corner.
MENSAJE_PEZ_ROMPIO_LINEA_PESCA: The fish broke your fishing line.
MENSAJE_NO_TIENE_CREDITOS_SUFICIENTES: You don't have enough credits to buy that item. You can upgrade your subscription at the following link: https://www.patreon.com/nolandstudios/membership
MENSAJE_NO_TIENE_ITEM_SELECCIONADO: You don't have any item selected.
MENSAJE_PEZ_ROMPIO_LINEA_PESCA_DUPLICADO: The fish broke your fishing line.
MENSAJE_AGUA_POCO_PROFUNDA_BARCA_PODRIA_: Warning! The water is shallow; your boat might break. You can only walk.
MENSAJE_TERRENO_ROCOSO_BARCA_PODRIA_ROMP: Warning! The terrain is rocky; your boat might break. You can only swim.
MENSAJE_LA_CANTIDAD_DEBE_SER_MAYOR_A_0: The quantity must be greater than 0.

MENSAJE_NIVEL_MAXIMO_ABORDAJE: Please enter a number between 1 and 47 in the Maximum Boarding Level field.
MENSAJE_NIVEL_MINIMO_MAYOR_MAXIMO: The Minimum Boarding Level must be less than the Maximum Boarding Level.
MENSAJE_PARAMETROS_INVALIDOS: Please make sure to enter valid numeric values in all fields.
MENSAJE_NIVEL_MAXIMO_ERROR: The maximum level must be between 1 and 47 and greater than or equal to the minimum level.
MENSAJE_NIVEL_MINIMO_ERROR: The minimum level must be between 1 and 47.
MENSAJE_VALOR_NUMERO_ERROR: Please enter a valid numeric value.
MENSAJE_VALOR_MAXIMO_ERROR: The value cannot be greater than 100K.

MENSAJE_ABANDONAR_MISION: Are you sure you want to abandon the mission?

MENSAJE_PUBLICAR_PERSONAJE_COSTO: , 20,000 gold coins will be deducted. If you want to cancel it, you must do so from the website.

MENSAJE_LIMITE_JUGADORES_DIVISIBLE: The player limit must be divisible by the team size.

MENSAJEBOX_ERROR_FUENTES: Some fonts could not be loaded, please reinstall the game to fix them.

MENSAJEBOX_ERROR_ENVIO_EMAIL: The server could not send the activation email.
MENSAJEBOX_USERNAME_NO_INICIA_CON_NUMERO: Username cannot start with a number.
MENSAJEBOX_PASSWORD_SIN_LETRAS_MAYUSCULA: The password has no uppercase letters.
MENSAJEBOX_PASSWORD_SIN_LETRAS_MINUSCULA: The password has no lowercase letters.

MENSAJEBOX_SERVIDOR_MAX_USUARIOS: The server has reached the max. number of users.
MENSAJEBOX_CUENTA_NO_ACTIVADA: The account has not been activated.
MENSAJEBOX_ACTIVO_PATRON: You must be an active PATRON to play at this time. Consider supporting the project on www.patreon.com
MENSAJEBOX_ACTUALIZAR_JUEGO: Please update the game, you're using an old build. We recommend closing and reopening steam to force the update.
MENSAJEBOX_EMAIL_ENVIADO: An email has been sent to
MENSAJEBOX_PASSWORD_CONTAINS_USERNAME: The password cannot contain the username.
MENSAJEBOX_PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: The password must have at least one upper case letter.
MENSAJEBOX_PASSWORD_LOWERCASE: The password must have at least one lower case letter.
MENSAJEBOX_PASSWORD_NUMBER: The password must have at least one number.
MENSAJEBOX_CODIGO_RECUPERACION_ANTIGUO: The recovery code is too old.
MENSAJEBOX_CODIGO_EXPIRADO: The code has expired, codes are valid for 10 mins, please request a new one.
MENSAJEBOX_CONTRASENAS_NO_COINCIDEN: The entered passwords do not match.
MENSAJEBOX_BIENVENIDO: Welcome to Argentum Online! Do you already have an account? Log in! Otherwise, click on 'Account' to create one.

MENSAJEBOX_INVITAR_AMIGOS: Invite your friends and enjoy your journey through Argentum 20 together!
MENSAJEBOX_AYUDA_JUEGO: If you need help in the game, type /GM and write your query
MENSAJEBOX_CONFIGURAR_JUEGO: Did you know that you can customize the game to your liking, such as breathing, throwing modes, and keys?
MENSAJEBOX_HELP_IN_GAME: If you need help in the game, type /GM and write your question.
MENSAJEBOX_GAME_SETTINGS: Did you know you can customize the game to your liking, such as breathing, throwing modes, and keys?
ERROR_NOMBRE_LONGITUD_INVALIDA: You must enter a name between 3 and 18 characters.
ERROR_CARACTERES_INVALIDOS: Only letters and spaces are allowed.
ERROR_ESPACIOS_INICIO_FIN: Spaces at the beginning or end are not allowed.
MENSAJE_TU_DESCRIPCIÓN_NO: Your description cannot be so long (Max. 50 characters).
MENSAJE_INGRESE_CANTIDAD_QUE: Enter the amount you wish to withdraw.
MENSAJE_UTILICE_DENUNCIAR_NICK: Use /denunciar NICK to report a user's messages.
MENSAJE_VALOR_INCORRECTO_UTILICE: Incorrect value. Use /telep NICKNAME MAPA X Y.
MENSAJE_MIDI_INCORRECTO_UTILICE: Incorrect midi. Use /forcemidimap MIDI MAP, where the map is optional.
MENSAJE_UTILICE_FORCEMIDIMAP_MIDI: Use /forcemidimap MIDI MAP, where the map is optional.
MENSAJE_UTILICE_FORCEWAVMAP_WAV: Use /forcewavmap WAV MAP X Y, where the last 3 are optional.
MENSAJE_INGRESE_NOMBRE_DEL: Enter the user's name. Use /DAR NOMBRE@REASON@ITEM[@QUANTITY=1].
MENSAJE_INGRESE_MOTIVO_DAR: Enter the reason to give. Use /DAR NOMBRE@REASON@ITEM[@QUANTITY=1].

MENSAJE_DEBES_SER_NIVEL: You must be level 5 or higher to use global!!!
